course_recommendation.recommendation_reasoning: The website content is overwhelmingly focused on software development, programming languages (JAVA, Python, PHP, etc.), web/mobile application development, cloud consulting, DevOps, and various software solutions (CRM, ERP, MLM, ePOS, Inventory). While digital marketing services are offered, the core business and displayed expertise are deeply technical.

metadata.institution_name: Bloatware IT Solutions | Software Development Company | Mobile Apps Development | CRM Software | ERP Software & Website
